questions.text:
This app aims to collect data (primarily coughs, breathing and voice) as part of a project (covid-19-sounds.org) which could inform the diagnosis of COVID-19.

The app will collect basic demographics, medical history, some voice samples (while you read text on the screen) and a few seconds of breathing and coughing. We also collect one sample of your location. Note that you must be 16 years or older. You can view our privacy policy at covid-19-sounds.org/privacy.html
Do you have any of these medical conditions? (can choose more than one)
options: Previous stroke or Transient Ischaemic Attack
HIV or an impaired immune system

questions.text: Do you, or have you ever smoked (including e-cigarettes)?
options: Current smoker (11 or more cigarettes per day)

questions.text: Thank you! Your participation is extremely helpful to us. We will now initiate a symptom survey.
